attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In highlight to the gay rights activists being savagely beaten for expressing their views, it is time for the UK and UN to impose sanctions allowing Russians to live without fear of oppression. Homosexuality is not a crime and we as a country should concentrate on educating the populous.
We can invade Iraq to 'free' the people from oppression, so surely we can begin talks with Russia to 'free' its people.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
